otp.codeSent: A code has been sent to

sync.syncErrorMessage: An error occurred during data synchronization. Please try again.
sync.syncCompletedMessage: All your data has been successfully synchronized.
sync.preparingData: We are preparing your data for an optimal experience.
sync.pleaseWait: Please wait, this operation only takes a few seconds.

guard.confirmPinDescription: To access the application, please confirm your PIN code

verification.title: PIN Code Verification
verification.description: Please enter your PIN code to access the application
verification.tooManyAttempts: Too many incorrect attempts. For security reasons, you must create a new PIN code.
verification.forgotPin: Forgot PIN code? Create a new one

creation.instructionsVerify: Please confirm your existing PIN code to verify that you remember it.
creation.instructionsCreate: Choose a PIN code that does not contain 4 identical digits or numeric sequences.
creation.instructionsConfirm: Confirm your PIN code to verify that you remember it.

toast.pinSavedDescription: Your PIN code has been saved successfully

onboarding.title: Account Initialization
onboarding.setupCompleteDescription: Sign in now to your account with your username and new password

start.description: You are a few steps away from completing your account setup.

securityQuestions.title: Set your security questions
securityQuestions.description: In the dropdowns below, select questions that can be used later to confirm your identity if you forget your password.

createPassword.title: Choose a password
createPassword.description: We recommend creating a unique password - one that you don't use for another website or application. Note: You will not be able to reuse your old password once you have changed it.

confirmDetails.title: Confirm your information
confirmDetails.description: Carefully review your initialization information below. This information is
confirmDetails.descriptionEnd: if you forget your credentials. Make sure they are correct before confirming.

errors.missingUserInfo: User information missing. Please log in again.
errors.initializationErrorDescription: An error occurred while creating the account.
errors.validationErrorDescription: The provided data is not valid. Please check your information.
errors.userErrorDescription: Invalid user information. Please log in again.

success.accountCreatedDescription: Your account has been successfully created.

recovery.title: Account Recovery
recovery.emailForUsername: Enter the email address associated with your account to recover your username
recovery.emailForPassword: Enter the email address associated with your account to reset your password
recovery.emailDefault: Enter the email address associated with your account
recovery.accountExistsUsername: If this account exists, the username has been sent by email
recovery.accountExistsPassword: If this account exists, a reset link has been sent by email
recovery.noQuestionsDescription: No security questions were found for this account.
recovery.securityWarning: For security reasons, please answer the security questions associated with your account.
recovery.missingData: Recovery data missing. Please restart the process.
recovery.missingToken: Reset token missing. Please restart the process.
recovery.resetSuccess: Your password has been reset successfully!
recovery.passwordWarning: We recommend creating a unique password - one you don't use for another website or app.

messages.usernameSent: If this account exists, the username has been sent by email
messages.resetLinkSent: If this account exists, a reset link has been sent by email
messages.recoveryDataMissing: Recovery data missing. Please restart the process.
messages.resetTokenMissing: Reset token missing. Please restart the process.
messages.passwordResetSuccess: Your password has been reset successfully!
